title: Beijing 2022: Jamie Anderson talks slopestyle and tips to feel good
description:
Our daily Beijing 2022 podcast continues with the USA's Jamie Anderson who is a double Olympic champion snowboarder from the USA. Jamie shares some tactics for feeling good, why it's ok to find support sometimes, and her hopes for the Winter Olympics in China.

If you liked this - be sure to check out the full length episode.
